full_summary:
===========================

## Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

### Title

Translation Services: Acquisition of French Translation Services for General and Administrative Texts

### Solicitation Number

EP745-241589/A

### Status

Expired

### Brief Description

This notice invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the acquisition of translation services for the Translation Bureau, from English to French in the field of "General and Administrative Texts". The scope of work includes the translation of up to 7,500,000 words distributed as follows: 5,000,000 words for the initial period of two (2) years and up to 2,500,000 words for the one-year irrevocable option to extend the contract.

### Notice Type and Solicitation Method

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Solicitation Method: Competitive - Selective tendering

### Category and Subcategory

* Category: SRV (Services)
* Subcategory: R109D (Translation Services)

### Trade Agreements and Preference

Participation in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) is invited.

### Contracting Entity

Public Works and Government Services Canada

### Point of Contact

* Name: Josée Ménard
* Email: josee.menard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 858-7638

### Notice Expiry Date

The notice expired on 2024-01-15T14:00:00.

### Supplier Information

Pre-qualified suppliers for the Translation Services precondition are invited to submit a proposal. The following suppliers have been invited:

* COMPOSITION STE-FOY INC
* SYNTAGME INC.
* LES TRADUCTEURS REUNIS, S.C.C.
* SERVICES LINGUISTIQUES VERSACOM
* SOLUDOC INC.
* ...  ...  ... (list of 13 suppliers)

To request a copy of the solicitation document, contact the Contracting Officer at the email address above.

This notice announces the intention of Public Works and Government Services Canada to enter into a Service Arrangement (SA) for the procurement of French translation services. This notice is a Request for Proposal (RFP) and adheres to the principles of best value. All qualified Respondents who arise from this notice are invited to submit a proposal.
